Story: You are in Canada, your home. You wish to explore yourself and finally land in the most peaceful country in the world. You can always chose to come back to your homeland
Navigation: Press 1 to go to Barrie, Press 2 to go to Toronto Airport

Story: Before you leave, you wish to have a sip of double double and a honey dip donut
Navigation: Press 1 to go to Toronto Airport

Story: Now it is time to decide how you are going to start your world tour. You can choose to go to Brazil or Argentina. Remember, each path has a different destination.
Navigation: Press 1 to go to Brasilia, Press 2 to go to Buenos Aires

Story: You are in Brazil and you are going to explore tha Amazon. You may earn extra power to survive if you land in an unsafe country in the future.
You are in Aregentina. You can visit the famous Iguazu falls.
You made it to Nigeria. In here, you can watch movies, explore different cultures and meet some nicest people on the globe.
Welcome to the land of pyramids, Egypt. It is the place where souls do not die. You can earn a spiritual power to earn immunity to any death potential attack in the future.
Navigation: Press 1 to go to Damascus, Press 2 to go to Berlin

Story: Spain is one the most beautiful places but do not be deceived by its beauty. You can choose to watch Lionel Messi play at Camp Nou in Barcelona or go to portugal and meet Christiano Ronaldo.
Navigation: Press 1 to go to Barcelona, Press 2 to go to Lisbon

Story: There is no escape. You are dead. However, you can use your super power to survive.
The land of Germans where it is hard to deal with people. Hope you can deal with them. You get to choose if you want to go to Norway or Russia.
Navigation: Press 1 to go to London, Press 2 to go to Bern

Story: Yayy! You decided to watch the Greatest Of All Time footballer play. You shall not regret it. You get a signed Barcelona jersey from the G.O.A.T.
Yayy! You decided to watch Ronaldo play. You end up being disapopinted as Portugal lost and Ronaldo was a bench warmer the whole game. Oops!! Something to cheer you? You are going to France :)
England, where you can watch queen and taste some good whiskey. Enjoy yourself and do not forget to watch some good football games.
Alright! Snow might not be new to someone coming from Canada. But, swiss is beautiful too. Relax and take some time to meet your inner self.
Alright! Snow might not be new to someone coming from Canada. But, watch the noerthern lights, it is beautiful too. Relax and take some time to meet your inner self.
Wuff! You are in Russia. But you can choose to go to back to Canada or test your luck if you can make it alive.
Country where fashion is in the air. Beauty is in abundance. Do not forget to visit the breathtaking Eiffel tower and other exciting places. Do not forget to have some nice Pizza.
Navigation: Press 1 to go to Dubai, Press 2 to go to Ankara

Story: It is getting warmer. Any guess why? You are in Dubaiii!!! But you get to visit some breathtaking manmade islands and other magnificient infra structures. You can gain a special power but it comes at a price because nothing is free in Dubai :)
You landed in Turkey. Try all the delicious confectionries and take some time to explore the beauty of the country.
You are in India. So many places to visit, but you only have limited time to pick from plenty. But you got to negotiate to decide where your next destination would be.
Navigation: Press 1 to go to Hanoi, Press 2 to go to Jakarta

Story: Your destined to have a pitstop at vietnam. But you got to be careful about what you choose as your next stop
Navigation: Press 1 to go to Beijing, Press 2 to go to Tokyo

Story: Beautiful beaches and shores. You are only few steps away from heaven now.
Another block in the journey. You can choose to use your power so that you can back to Tim hortons to enjoy your double double again or to die.
Smartest people around you with the most advanced technology all around you. You are almost there to attain peace forever.
The land of kangaroos. Most of the land is desert but amazing cities that you can visit. Enjoy your time as you are only one step away.
Finalllyyy! You made to the land with no violence, no hatred. It is nothing but heaven. You won! Congratulations on making it to the haven on the planet.
